segments.text: I haven't got enough for prosecuting him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you find someone who is in the know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just thinking about that , but the trouble is , I don't know who is well in the know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you ask his former sectary , Lora ? She knows a lot about him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for reminding me . She's the right person to help me .
segments.speaker: S1
